title.rendered: “Digital Marketing industry provides the platform to be innovative & creative while working.”- Rachit Kainth

content.rendered:
Hi Readers! Meet Digiperformer Rachit Kainth, working as a Social Media Executive at BelCibo Hospitality Pvt Ltd after completing the advanced training program – dCDMC training from Digiperform. In chit-chat session, he shared why he decided to choose digital marketing as a career and opted Digiperform to be the part of his journey. Have a look!

Digiperform- It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Rachit- Hi, I am Rachit Kainth, currently working as a Social Media Executive at BelCibo Hospitality Pvt Ltd. I am a simple boy from Delhi with a creative mind. Also, I am a Certified Digital Marketer from Digiperform with a demonstrated history of working in the social media marketing profile.

Digiperform- What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Rachit- After graduation, I had been looking for long-term opportunities where I could enhance my skill and look for fast career growth as well. I had always believed to work in an industry which could provide you the platform to be innovative & creative while working. Also, the industry which could give you a chance to meet skilled people and learn a lot from them.

Digiperform- What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Rachit- I have heard and read a lot about Digiperform. In the demo session, I really liked how they demonstrated about the updated LMS content and how they created the course material including exercises and test series. Secondly, they really paid attention to student’s queries and helped them to come out of the doubts at the same time. The trainers were very well updated with the new trends of digital marketing.

Digiperform- Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Rachit- The best part of Digiperform sessions was that trainers used to spare some time for asking doubts. We were free to ask doubts even after the classes as well. That really helped us a lot.

Digiperform- Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Rachit- Yes, I would definitely consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital Marketing Training.

Digiperform- If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Rachit-  I really had a great experience in Digiperform. I would give 8 out of 10.

Digiperform- Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Rachit- In the coming years, I would see myself to run my own digital marketing agency.

Digiperform- If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Rachit- Be attentive while taking classes and don’t feel shy if you have any query. The trainers are very cooperative to answer your every question. Also, apply your learning in practice too. There would be no point in taking classes if you are not implementing your learnings into practicals.

Digiperform- Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Rachit- Nice and caring management for students. Thanks Rachit for being the part of Digiperform.
